statements: SELECT * FROM transportation_emissions
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_type, emissions_kg FROM transportation_emissions
SELECT city, country FROM transportation_emissions WHERE emissions_kg > 1000
SELECT city FROM transportation_emissions WHERE fuel_type = 'Diesel' ORDER BY emissions_kg DESC
SELECT * FROM transportation_emissions WHERE country = 'USA'
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_type, emissions_kg FROM transportation_emissions WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM transportation_emissions WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY emissions_kg DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM transportation_emissions ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT vehicle_type, SUM(emissions_kg) AS total_emissions FROM transportation_emissions GROUP BY vehicle_type;
SELECT * FROM transportation_emissions WHERE emissions_kg > 1000 AND country = 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE trip_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_type, carbon_emissions FROM emissions_data WHERE distance_travelled > 100;
SELECT MAX(carbon_emissions) AS max_emissions FROM emissions_data;
SELECT trip_date, carbon_emissions FROM emissions_data ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, key_features FROM travel_strategies WHERE implementation_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE vehicle_type='SUV';
SELECT trip_id, carbon_emissions FROM emissions_data WHERE carbon_emissions > 1000;
SELECT trip_date, vehicle_type FROM emissions_data ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(carbon_emissions) AS avg_emissions FROM emissions_data;
SELECT strategy_name, key_features FROM travel_strategies WHERE implementation_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM transportation_emissions WHERE vehicle_id = 1
SELECT vehicle_type, fuel_type FROM transportation_emissions ORDER BY fuel_type DESC
SELECT strategy_name, impact_on_emissions FROM travel_strategies WHERE impact_on_emissions > 0.5
SELECT vehicle_id, distance_covered, travel_date FROM travel_data WHERE distance_covered > 100 ORDER BY travel_date ASC
SELECT * FROM transportation_emissions WHERE co2_emissions < 50
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, fuel_type, co2_emissions FROM transportation_emissions
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, co2_emissions, fuel_type FROM transportation_emissions ORDER BY co2_emissions DESC
SELECT * FROM travel_strategies WHERE impact_on_emissions > 0.5
SELECT vehicle_id, distance_covered, travel_date FROM travel_data WHERE distance_covered > 1000 ORDER BY travel_date DESC
SELECT data_id, vehicle_id FROM travel_data JOIN transportation_emissions ON travel_data.vehicle_id = transportation_emissions.vehicle_id
SELECT * FROM emissions_data ORDER BY vehicle_type DESC;
SELECT id, mode_name FROM travel_modes WHERE id < 5;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM travel_routes WHERE emissions_saved IS NULL;
SELECT id, strategy_name, description FROM eco_strategies ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE emissions > 3.0;
SELECT * FROM emissions_data WHERE emissions > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_type, emissions FROM emissions_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'SUV' AND emissions <= 200;
SELECT * FROM travel_modes WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY mode_name;
SELECT route_name, distance, emissions_saved FROM travel_routes WHERE emissions_saved > 50 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT * FROM eco_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes;
SELECT mode_name, emissions_factor FROM transportation_modes ORDER BY mode_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT trip_id, trip_date, distance FROM trips WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY trip_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM eco_strategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM transportation_modes;
SELECT mode_name, emissions_factor FROM transportation_modes WHERE emissions_factor > 0.5 ORDER BY mode_name DESC;
SELECT t.trip_id, t.trip_date, t.distance, tm.mode_name FROM trips t JOIN transportation_modes tm ON t.mode_id = tm.mode_id WHERE t.distance > 100 ORDER BY trip_date ASC;

SELECT u.user_name, t.trip_date, t.emissions, ts.strategy_name FROM users u JOIN user_trips ut ON u.user_id = ut.user_id JOIN trips t ON ut.trip_id = t.trip_id JOIN eco_strategies ts ON t.mode_id = ts.strategy_id WHERE u.user_name LIKE 'J%' AND t.emissions > 10 ORDER BY t.trip_date DESC;

SELECT tm.mode_name, COUNT(*) AS num_trips, AVG(t.emissions) AS avg_emissions FROM transportation_modes tm JOIN trips t ON tm.mode_id = t.mode_id GROUP BY tm.mode_name HAVING AVG(t.emissions) > 5 ORDER BY num_trips DESC;
